Header: JVP says majority MPs do not support UNP Leader
Content: General Secretary of the JVP Tilvyn Silva says that a majority of members in Parliament do not support United National Party Leader Ranil Wickremasinghe. He said this during a media briefing in Colombo. General Secretary of the JVP Tilvyn Silva said that people should act impartially at this moment. He said that they should be able to oppose their political parties if those parties are acting in an un-justifiable manner. He requested the people to come forward to defeat the conspiracy. He said that the JVP is there to defeat the conspiracy but not to setup governments. He pointed out that all 122 members in parliament are not there for Mr. Ranil Wickremasinghe.
